0.text: Innate: Renekton generates  5 Fury each time he lands a basic attack on an enemy, and loses 4 Fury per second if he hasn't dealt or taken damage in the last 12 seconds.

1.text: When at or above 50 Fury, Renekton's next basic ability consumes 50 Fury to enhance its effects. The enhanced ability does not generate Fury.

2.text: Renekton generates 50% bonus Fury from all sources while  below 50% of his maximum health.

0.text: Active: Renekton cleaves around himself, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and  healing himself for each enemy hit, up to a cap.

1.text: Against  champions, the healing is increased by 300%.

2.text: Renekton generates  2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per cast capped at 30.

3.text: Reign of Anger: Cull the Meek deals additional damage, increases the total healing by 200%, and the healing cap by 300%.

4.text: Renekton cannot basic attack nor cast  Slice,  Dice, or  Dominus for 0.25 seconds after Cull the Meek's activation.

0.text: Active: Renekton enhances his cleaver, causing his next basic attack within 7 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range and strike the target twice, dealing modified physical damage and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Each slash applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and grants  Fury. Striking an enemy  champion grants 10 bonus Fury.

1.text: Reign of Anger: Renekton instead strikes 3 times, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields on the target upon the first strike, as well as increasing the  stun duration to 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Ruthless Predator  resets Renekton's basic attack timer.

3.text: Renekton cannot cast  Cull the Meek,  Slice, nor  Dice during Ruthless Predator's windup.

0.text: Active: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through.

1.text: Hitting an enemy allows Renekton to cast Dice within the next 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies he passes through.

1.text: Both Slice and Dice generate  2 Fury for each non-champion hit, and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per dash capped at 30.

2.text: Reign of Anger: Dice deals additional damage to all enemies and  reduces their armor for 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Renekton empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 20% increased size,  25 bonus range and  20 Fury.

1.text: For the duration, he deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to all nearby enemies and generates 5 Fury per second, up to a maximum of 75 Fury.

1.concerningText: Active: Renekton cleaves around himself, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and  healing himself for each enemy hit, up to a cap.
Against  champions, the healing is increased by 300%.

2.concerningText: Active: Renekton enhances his cleaver, causing his next basic attack within 7 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range and strike the target twice, dealing modified physical damage and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Each slash applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and grants  Fury. Striking an enemy  champion grants 10 bonus Fury.
Reign of Anger: Renekton instead strikes 3 times, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields on the target upon the first strike, as well as increasing the  stun duration to 1.5 seconds.

3.concerningText: Active: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through.

4.concerningText: Active: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies he passes through.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
